articles.title: Billionaires Index: Gautam Adani slips by a spot, is 14th richest in world - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The businessman was overtaken by China's Zhong Shanshan. The duo follow Mukesh Ambani, who is the wealthiest in Asia.
articles.content: Billionaire Gautam Adani was on Saturday surpassed by China's Zhong Shanshan as the 13th wealthiest person in the world, according to the Bloomberg Billionaires Index, as the rankings, which are upda… [+1428 chars]

articles.title: 4 Singapore Sailing Federation officials test positive for Covid-19 at Cambodia meet - TODAY
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Four Singapore Sailing Federation (SSF) officials at the Southeast Asian Sailing Championship in Sihanoukville, Cambodia, have tested positive for Covid-19, said the federation's executive director on Friday (Dec 17).
